availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Todd (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Ireland. Married to Aseneth A. Rose Todd. Father of James Todd, Mary Todd, Ella Todd, John Todd, and Belle Todd. Merchant in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Covington in 1860. Employed Margaret Coda and Bridget Troy as servants in Covington in 1860. Merchant in Kenton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 263A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 688.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, pp. 233B-234A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Kenton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 232.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994043, Kenton County Births.
"John Todd (1823-1874)," Find A Grave, Memorial 136626112, accessed April 10, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/136626112.
